thread.title: Another Big Retailer Is Considering Dropping Ivanka Trump’s Brand
thread.title_full: Another Big Retailer Is Considering Dropping Ivanka Trump’s Brand

author: Lindsey Ellefson
title: Another Big Retailer Is Considering Dropping Ivanka Trump’s Brand
text:
Another Big Retailer Is Considering Dropping Ivanka Trump’s Brand by Lindsey Ellefson | 5:28   
We know how Donald Trump feels about internal leaks, but what about Overstock.com? 
Thanks to the latest exclusive from The Young Turks , we could find out very soon. See, an anonymous source sent them an internal memo from the higher-ups at Overstock and, as it turns out, the online retailer is looking to join Nordstrom in dropping Ivanka Trump ‘s brand from its selection. 
Ana Kasparian delivered the full memo from CEO Patrick M. Byrne , which took the president to task for “race-baiting,” then said that 18 months ago, the older Trump’s products were removed from Overstock while Ivanka’s remained, on the grounds that it would be “un-Amrican … to go after the guy’s daughter.” 
The CEO asked his employees to vote on whether both Trumps should have their products removed, only the president should, or neither should have their products removed from the site. Cenk Uygur commended Byrne for asking his employees what they thought the company should do going forward. 
Watch above.
